examples.example: 这次我们成功收获了一吨粮食，大家都特别开心。

translate.english: This time we successfully harvested one ton of grain, and everyone was extremely happy.

examples.example: 他凭借自己的努力，一次性搬运了一吨的货物，真是令人钦佩。

translate.english: He carried one ton of goods at one time with his own efforts, which is really admirable.

examples.example: 我们齐心协力，终于把一吨重的物资成功运到了目的地。

translate.english: We worked together and finally successfully transported one ton of materials to the destination.
